data.title: Apple reportedly preparing low-cost iPhone, iPad for March launch

data.title: Snap shares soar more than 40% after earnings show it's weathering Apple's privacy changes

data.title: Tesla recalls 817,000 vehicles in U.S. over seat belt reminder alert
data.description: Tesla Inc is recalling more than 817,000 vehicles in the United States because an audible alert may not activate when a vehicle starts and the driver has not buckled the seat belt, a U.S. auto safety regulator said.

data.title: Facebook and Google stocks have diverged, and the reason is Apple
data.description: While Facebook parent Meta's stock has tanked to an 18-month low, Google is trading near a record. Blame Apple's impact on ad targeting.

data.description: The legislation addresses key gripes app developers including Spotify, Epic Games, BaseCamp and others have raised about Apple and Google.
